intro: Florestina liebmannii, commonly known as the African violet. It is a flowering plant native to South Africa, characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and showy, violet-colored flowers. The plant belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is typically cultivated as a houseplant due to its ornamental value. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires well-draining soil to prevent root rot. Its compact growth habit makes it a popular choice for indoor gardening.
